apps.name: uYouPlusExtra
apps.localizedDescription:
uYouPlusExtra is a modified version of uYouPlus with some Extra features (requires iOS 14.0 and later).
Full infomation about uYouPlusExtra is available on Github: https://github.com/arichorn/uYouPlusExtra

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up uYouPlusExtra! https://github.com/arichorn/uYouPlusExtra#credits

Attention:
- If you like the app, considering support the developers!
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work.

Known issues:
- uYou's issues: https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube/issues
- uYouPlus's issues: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues
- uYouPlusExtra's issues: https://github.com/arichorn/uYouPlusExtra/issues

versions.localizedDescription:
What's new in the 18.08.1 update:
- Downgraded YouTube from v18.27.3 to v18.08.1
  - Downgraded to prevent the app from crashing when playing video
- New Options
  - Hide Subscriptions Notification Badge
  - Disable double tap to skip (Legacy)
    - Added this option in case the original double tap to skip option doesn’t work in v18.08.1

**KNOWN ISSUE**
If you change the 'YT Video Quality on WiFi/Cellular' setting in the uYou settings, playing any video will cause the app to immediatly crash. A FULL reinstall of the app is the only way to fix it

What's new in the 18.27.3 update:
- Updated YouTube from v18.25.1 to v18.27.3
- Re-added “Hide uYou Tab” Option
  - Option has been improved and now works with newer YouTube versions
- Added Tweaks
  - YTVideoOverlay
  - YouQuality
  - YTNoCommunityPosts
    - To re-enable Communit Posts, go to YouTube General settings, scroll to the bottom, and toggle the 'Show Community Posts' option
- Updated “Hide Search Ads”
  - Can now block even more Ads
- Updated LowContrastMode to v1.3.1
  - Updated labels in _ASDisplayView
- Updated OLED + OLD Dark Mode
  - OLD Dark Mode is fixed, but not OLED yet
- Updated YouMute
  - YouMute now requires YTVideoOverlay Tweak

apps.name: BHTwitter
apps.localizedDescription:
BHTwitter is a modified version of Twitter with many additional features.
 Full infomation about BHTwitter is available on Github: https://github.com/BandarHL/BHTwitter

versions.localizedDescription:
Updated Twitter version to 9.63
What's new in the 3.9.1 update:
- Add a new option to force Twitter to always use the following page.
